name: from
description: The 'from' image. It should be displayed on the viewport when progress=0.0

name: to
description: The 'to' image.  It should be displayed on the viewport when progress=1.0

name: progress
description: The 'progress' moves from 0.0 to 1.0 during a transition. It is the only way to make your GLSL Transition animated.

name: resolution
description: The resolution in pixels of the canvas viewport.
